test.name: FactorialOfFive
test.expression: ({ 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 }) Num aggregate Result starting 1: Result * Num

test.name: RolledOutIntervals
test.expression: ({Interval[DateTime(2022, 1, 8, 13, 0, 0, 0), DateTime(2022, 1, 15, 16, 0, 0, 0)], Interval[DateTime(2022, 1,10, 15, 0, 0, 0), DateTime(2022, 1, 20, 20, 0, 0, 0)], Interval[DateTime(2022, 1,25, 10, 0, 0, 0), DateTime(2022, 1, 30, 15, 0, 0, 0)]}) M aggregate R starting (null as List<Interval >): R union ({M X let S: Max({ end of Last(R) + 1 day, start of X }), E: S + duration in days of X return Interval[S, E] })
test.output: TODO pending fix to CQL aggregate function
